BJS: I have not seen this experiment, however S4HANA will include SAC (SAP Analytics Cloud) which will address much of the operational month reporting and reduce the month end close. This is already in scope and will be delivered by the project October 2026. The experiment would need to export significant amounts of data from ODM to another data warehouse (Fabric?) and create a new set of reports which are already done in ODM, plus reconciling from the ODM to the new Fabric warehouse.

column16: BJS: This seems very nebulous. The procurement cycle time is not constrained by system (Coupa) but the processes around it. This will involve majority Coupa and P2P SAP. Supplier Lifecycle work is addressing a number of these processes and streamlining. We also have very limited Coupa support to create these new integrations for data whilst also replacing SAP this year, hence the ability to support this initiative would be very low.  DD&A would need to supply a DevOps team for Coupa to design and build the integrations.
